title: Rishi Sunak – 2020 Comments on the Kickstart Scheme
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rishi Sunak, the Chancellor of the Exchequer, on 12 November 2020.
content:
Our country’s future will be built by the next generation, so it’s vital that we harness the talent of young people as we rebuild from the pandemic. But this isn’t just about kickstarting our economy, we’re giving opportunity and hope to thousands of young people, kickstarting their careers and offering them a brighter future.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance

  *[ILACS]: inspections of local authority children's services

  *[SEND]: special educational needs and/or disabilities
